attributes.action:
Stop the war and end the famine in Yemen.
The UK is complicit in its suffering!
attributes.additional_details:
Every month, over 2000 children starve to death or die from preventable diseases due to the current conflict, with the Saudi-led coalition issuing a blockade of food import which is going to result in a catastrophic famine.

http://chng.it/nTh5RmjfzT
attributes.background: End arms sales to Saudi Arabia that end up killing Yemeni civilians. Help lift the blockade on food imports causing a famine. Investigate the war crimes committed against yemeni civilians by the Saudi-led coalition. Put in place a humanitarian truce to protect civilians.
